channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Europe-wide army is a dumb idea, EU foreign policy chief says: ‘maybe those people haven’t really thought this through practically’
item.description: “If you are already part of NATO then you can’t create a separate army," Kaja Kallas said at a security conference in Norway.

item.title: ‘The Chinese have invaded us in terms of merchandise’: Mexico and Argentina lead Latin America’s struggles with flood of imports
item.description: Temu averaged 114 million monthly active users in Latin America in the first half of 2025, a 165% increase year-on-year from 2024, Sensor Tower estima...

item.title: Why Most Corporate and Tech Chiefs Are Saying the Bare Minimum About Minneapolis
item.description: CEO silence about ICE, ‘isn’t neutral,’ one leader says. ‘It’s expensive. Letting this chaos continue is fiscal malpractice.’

item.title: Where’s my refund? These 2 changes at the IRS could slow down your check this tax season
item.description: Short staffing and the transition from paper checks to digital refunds are among the biggest challenges facing the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) this...

item.title: My Colleague Wants to Fire a Domestic Violence Survivor
item.description: I don’t know how to explain how wrong this is.

item.title: Trump erupts about Trevor Noah joke linking him to Bill Clinton and Jeffrey Epstein: ‘I can’t speak for Bill, but I have never been to Epstein Island’
item.description: Trevor Noah's savage joke said Trump wants Greenland because "Epstein’s island is gone, he needs a new island to hang out with Bill Clinton."

item.title: For Product-First Organizations, Progress Must Be Defined by Outcomes, Not Output
item.description: Development bottlenecks don’t disappear. They just move.

item.title: ‘No one is illegal on stolen land’: how the Grammys turned into a giant Trump roast and ICE protest
item.description: Even Justin and Hailey Bieber, who don’t normally address American politics, wore protest pins about ICE.

item.title: At the Grammys, host Trevor Noah roasts Nicki Minaj and takes aim at Trump with an Epstein joke
item.description: Trevor Noah once again roamed through the audience during his monologue to open the Grammy Awards , taking pokes at the stars while standing right nex...

item.title: Bad Bunny’s win at the 2026 Grammys is a first for a Spanish-language album
item.description: Bad Bunny won album of the year at the 2026 Grammy Awards for his critically-acclaimed “Debí Tirar Más Fotos,” closing out a surprising and history-ma...

item.title: It’s so cold in Florida that iguanas are falling out of trees
item.description: “I think in South Florida you're going to see iguanas falling from trees, I mean a lot, once it gets under 40 degrees,” Gov. Ron DeSantis said.

item.title: What to know about the notable VIPs named in the Epstein files, from Elon Musk to former Prince Andrew

item.title: Trump is shutting down D.C.’s Kennedy Center for 2 years this summer. Here’s why
item.description: President Donald Trump said Sunday he will move to close Washington’s Kennedy Center performing arts center for two years starting in July for constru...

item.title: 4 Personality Traits That Show You’re More Emotionally Intelligent Than You Think, Backed by Science
item.description: For example, disliking making small talk can be a good thing.

item.title: Scientists Find Signs of Alzheimer’s in an Unexpected Place for Celebrated Author Terry Pratchett
item.description: It could become a critical tool in helping treat the disease.
